Html:
Hi guys,

Hope you are well.

Great job with this Excel reader!

I just have a new excel file and the reader read sometimes blank cell instead of retrieving the value.

There is no specific format on thoses cells.

I'd like to attach the files but  it's not possible.

Could you help me on this please ? Did you faxe the same issue in the past ?

 

Best Regards,

Xavier
I have same issue. Did you resolve problem?

Hi,

Actually I didn't resolve the issue.

I just work with others excel spreadsheets as a work-around

This may be the same as this:

http://exceldatareader.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=4601
I am having the same issue.  The file is all just entered data, but it comes up blank in most of the cells.  Very strange.

I stepped through the code and it is happening on fields of type LABELSST.  It seems to be some sort of indexed string and when ExcelReader tries to get the indexed string, the index is larger than the number of strings, so it's blank.
